Qualifiers.scope: Carport standards for parking space clear opening dimensions shown in plan view.
Qualifiers.applicability: Covered parking spaces (carports). Applies to each individual parking space within a carport.

open_longitudinal_clear_length.description: Clear, unobstructed longitudinal dimension of the parking space (front-to-back), measured in plan view.
open_longitudinal_clear_length.measurement_reference: Measured along the parking space between the innermost faces of obstructions (e.g., columns, walls).

open_transverse_entrance_clear_width.description: Clear, unobstructed transverse opening at the entrance of the carport as seen in plan view.
open_transverse_entrance_clear_width.measurement_reference: Measured between the innermost faces of the entrance-side obstructions (e.g., corner columns).
open_transverse_entrance_clear_width.notes: Label indicates 'open' at the entrance in plan view but provides no numeric value in Figure 29.

corner_columns_presence.description: Presence of two corner columns bounding the carport opening.
corner_columns_presence.notes: Figure label 'One of 2 corner columns' appears illustrative; not an explicit requirement.

driveway_parking_surface_reference.description: Driving/parking surface used as the datum for measuring clearances.

Conditions.applicability: All covered carport parking spaces in plan view

Conditions.rule: open_transverse_entrance_clear_width value not specified in plan view
Conditions.impact: Cannot validate this dimension from Figure 29 alone; see cross-reference in Relationships.

dependencies.description: Clear dimension is measured between obstructions such as the corner columns when present.

cross_references.description: The 20 ft minimum appears as both the longitudinal plan dimension and the left elevation horizontal opening; they refer to the same clear length.
Front elevation provides a 10 ft minimum clear opening width that corresponds to the plan-view entrance opening.

Qualifiers.scope: Carport standards for clear opening dimensions shown in left side elevation.
Qualifiers.applicability: Covered parking spaces (carports). Applies to the side opening shown in left elevation.

horizontal_open_width_side.description: Clear, unobstructed horizontal opening width in left side elevation.
horizontal_open_width_side.measurement_reference: Measured horizontally between the innermost faces of side-bounding elements (e.g., corner columns).

vertical_clearance.description: Clear vertical height from the driveway/parking surface to the bottom of the roof system.
vertical_clearance.measurement_reference: Measured vertically from the driveway/parking surface up to the lowest element of the bottom roof system.

bottom_roof_system_reference.description: Bottom of the roof system serving as the upper limit for vertical clearance measurement.

corner_columns_presence.description: Presence of two corner columns bounding the opening in elevation.

Constants.name: min_horizontal_open_width_side
Constants.source: Figure 30 (Left Side Elevation) label: '20' min. open'

Constants.name: min_vertical_clearance
Constants.source: Figure 30 (Left Side Elevation) label: '7' min. open'

Conditions.applicability: Left side elevation of covered carports

dependencies.description: Vertical clearance is measured to the bottom of the roof system.

cross_references.description: The 20 ft minimum side elevation width aligns with the plan-view longitudinal minimum.
7 ft minimum vertical clearance applies in both left and front elevations.

Qualifiers.scope: Carport standards for clear opening dimensions shown in front elevation.
Qualifiers.applicability: Covered parking spaces (carports). Applies to the front opening shown in front elevation.

horizontal_open_width_front.description: Clear, unobstructed horizontal opening width in front elevation.
horizontal_open_width_front.measurement_reference: Measured horizontally between the innermost faces of front-bounding elements (e.g., corner columns).

vertical_clearance.description: Clear vertical height from the driveway/parking surface to the bottom of the roof system.
vertical_clearance.measurement_reference: Measured vertically from the driveway/parking surface up to the lowest element of the bottom roof system.

bottom_roof_system_reference.description: Bottom of the roof system serving as the upper limit for vertical clearance measurement.

corner_columns_presence.description: Presence of two corner columns bounding the opening in elevation.

dependencies.description: Vertical clearance is measured to the bottom of the roof system.

cross_references.description: 7 ft minimum vertical clearance applies in both left and front elevations.
Provides the numeric minimum (10 ft) for the plan-view entrance opening.
